name: Thursby Software
overview:
Securing enterprise and personal mobility

Thursby is the leader in enterprise iPad, iPhone and Mac integration for clients from the Pentagon, to Johns Hopkins, to the Discovery Channel and BMW. Support ranges from individuals (BYOD) to organizationally furnished equipment across multiple sites and countries.

Thursby is US-owned, operated and a GSA Schedule holder, with its HQ in Arlington, Texas. We have over 70,000 clients in over 140 countries, including organizations with thousands of devices under management, and well over a million licenses sold to-date. Clients range from creative artists and publishing, to government, finance, healthcare, energy, research and education, to the FORTUNE 500, Global 2000 and OEMs.

milestones.description: Thursby Software moving to new corporate headquarters
